00026 #include "sysDefs.h"

00028 #ifndef MAX_PCI_BARS
00029 #define MAX_PCI_BARS 7    // do not count/use the expansion ROM
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #define MAX_DRIVER_NAME_LEN 128
00033 #define MAX_DRIVER_VERSION_LEN 128
00034 
00035 
00036 typedef char DriverVerStr_t[MAX_DRIVER_NAME_LEN];
00037 
00038 
00044 typedef struct
00045 {
00046     ULONG nBAR;          
00047     ULONG physStartAddr; 
00048     ULONG size;          
00049     bool memMapped;      
00050     USHORT flags;        
00051     UCHAR type;          
00053 } PCI_BAR_t;
00054 
00055 
00066 typedef struct
00067 {
00068     // Device Memory Access info
00069     ULONG numBARs;      
00070     PCI_BAR_t BAR[MAX_PCI_BARS];  
00071     UCHAR PCICfgReg[256];  
00073     // Device Interrupt info
00074     bool hasInterrupt;   
00075     ULONG intrVector;    
00078 } PCIResourceInfo_t;
00079 
00080 
00081 
00087 typedef struct
00088 {
00089     // Instance and device location info 
00090     ULONG devID;
00091 
00092     ULONG  busNum;         
00093     USHORT deviceNum;      
00094     USHORT functionNum;    
00095     ULONG   UINumber;      
00097     // Device DMA Common buffer memory info
00098     bool hasDmaBuf;        
00099     ULONG DmaBufSize;      
00100     bool DmaAddr64;        
00101     ULONG DmaPhyAddrHi;    
00102     ULONG DmaPhyAddrLo;    
00104     // PCIe Link properties needed for DMA construct of TLPs
00105     ULONG MaxPayloadSize;  
00106     ULONG MaxReadReqSize;  
00107     ULONG RCBSize;         
00108     ULONG LinkWidth;       
00111 } DMAResourceInfo_t;

00120     __u32 Write;
00121     __u32 Read;
00122 }
00123 DMATimers_t;

00130 {
00131     __u32 Write;

00134 DMABurstSizes_t;
